body_html: @m-gb Just to confirm: I noticed that you picked one of the few issues that are labeled beginner friendly, and not rgsoc17. You are very welcome to pick issues with the rgsoc17 label as well. Just check if someone is assigned, or ask in the Issue if it is available.
